executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.paragraph1: COOPEBANACIO faced a critical operational efficiency challenge: their commercial ecosystem was fragmented between HubSpot CRM (front-office) and QUARZO SISTEMAS' CODEAS ERP based on MS SQL Server (back-office), generating data silos, manual double-entry, and limited commercial pipeline visibility.
executiveSummary.paragraph2: DEVIT506 designed and implemented an intelligent bidirectional synchronization architecture that automatically synchronizes over 10,000 records between both ecosystems, achieving 100% write success rate and a 50% speed improvement over traditional implementations.

challenge.title: Operational Fragmentation Between Front-Office and Back-Office
challenge.description1: The organization operated with critical information silos: HubSpot CRM managed commercial relationships while the CODEAS ERP (MS SQL Server) maintained real financial and operational data.
challenge.description2: This disconnect generated manual double-entry, inability to visualize the commercial pipeline in context with updated financial data, and loss of agility in strategic decisions.
painPoints: Data silos between CRM and ERP compromising executive visibility
Manual double-entry with high risk of errors and inconsistencies
Lack of real-time visibility of credit status and financial products
Inability to automate commercial processes based on financial core data
Operational overhead in manual synchronization of over 10,000 records

solution.title: Intelligent Bidirectional Synchronization Architecture
solution.subtitle: Python 3.13 Engine + HubSpot API + MS SQL Server
solution.description: Automated synchronization system that dynamically maps 260+ custom properties between HubSpot and CODEAS ERP, prioritizing only fields with useful data through intelligent analysis that reduces data volume by 9x.

items.title: Architecture and Analysis
items.description: Complete mapping of 260+ custom properties between HubSpot CRM and CODEAS ERP SQL Server schema. Design of bidirectional architecture with dynamic property analysis that automatically identifies only fields with useful data (9x volume reduction).

items.title: Synchronization Engine Development
items.description: Implementation of specialized Python modules for optimized extraction from HubSpot (deals, tickets, contacts, owners, pipelines), writing with integrity guarantee using force_all_properties, automatic fallback, and robust rate limiting handling.

items.title: Optimization and Validation
items.description: Removal of pandas to reduce memory consumption by 70%, optimized batch processing for 50% speed improvement, exhaustive validation achieving 100% success rate in custom property writes.

items.title: Deployment and Automation
items.description: Configuration of automated scheduled synchronization on Windows Server with Task Scheduler, real-time monitoring with batch statistics, and complete technical documentation for knowledge transfer.

highlights.title: Key Engineering Decisions
items: Dynamic property analysis reducing data volume by 9x
Batch processing of up to 500 records with intermediate commits
Bidirectional architecture with automatic error fallback
Intelligent rate limiting handling with adaptive pauses
Automatic deduplication based on unique identifiers
